title: Captain America by Brubaker (2005-2013|100%|D+S|MM+E+DCP|2/6)
description:
For an explanation of the purpose of this torrent, please see the first part.
Part 1 -    <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618264" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9618264</a>

Part 2 - The Death of Captain America (7 Folders): This section deals with the ramifications of the murder of Steve Rogers, and how it affects the superhero community and his loved ones. We see the grieving process of many of his dearest friends, and the emergence of a new Captain America - who struggles with the role for a number of reasons. The plot threads deepen, and things look pretty grim. But all hope is not lost, yet...

10b Civil War - The Drums of War (CA 22-24)
10c Winter Soldier - Winter Kills (One-Shot)
11a The Death of a Dream (CA 25-30)
11b Fallen Son - The Death of Captain America [by Jeph Loeb]
12 The Burden of Dreams (CA 31-36)
13 The Man Who Bought America (CA 37-42)
14 The Man With No Face (CA 43-48)

All individual issues are digital, from Zone-Empire, as well as the Winter Kills tie-in. The Fallen Son collection is a special DCP edition by Kritter, which compiles all of the various stories into one volume. It focuses on the mourning of Wolverine, Daredevil, other Avengers and so forth. Thanks to all the great scanners as usual; please seed and enjoy! :-)
